1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>¿Bak'inc'al ok in a natek Mamin Jehová? Tokwal ok in tokcan c'ayc'ulal oj yin tojbalk'inal. ¿Bak'in wal ok a tx'ox a ba ayin?</t>
2: <t>¿Jantakto tiempo ok wetnej in c'ul yin cusc'ulal junjun c'u? ¿Jantakto tiempoal ok in cancan yul k'ab eb ajc'ul?</t>
3: <t>Mamin Jehová in Diosal, ocan t'anan win, tak'wej in, ak' a watx'c'ulal win yet watx' c'am chin pet cami.</t>
4: <t>Yalta nak ajc'ul oc win: Mayal ayc'ay wuj, ẍi talaji. C'am chi yal in c'ul chi tzaloj aj c'ul, k'inalok tatol chin ayc'ayi.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A a camc'ulal ayoc yipok in c'ul, chi tzaloj aj in c'ul yuj a colwal.</t>
6: <t>Mamin Jehová, ok ach in bitnej yuj a watx'c'ulal win.</t>
